resources:
Vision Next Skip Start Get Registration Status SVIT students participated in IT department Events can check online Registration Status . Live Notifications Get LIVE notification of all activities on your device held during VISION-2017. Luck Draw !! Students once registered through this app will be eligible for Luck Draw competition organized by IT department. Dashboard
Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer ///enigma Enigma 40 8866495525 Dhruvish Mehta If speed comes naturally to you and if you seek thrill in do-or-die situations, we invite you to take part in the ultimate battles through exciting problems. Plan.Solve.Escape Here you have to solve maximum questions on computer in short amount of time. Here you supposed to give the answer of questions and get the clues of the second stage, and finally by crack the questions and getting all the clues at last you can go out from the room. Here you solve the basic C programming and find the error. The twist is that you have only few second to solve the query after every that time you are supposed to change your computer. By following these steps, the candidates who give perfect output of maximum numbers of program without any error he/she will be winner. 1.There will be three rounds in the game.
2. Participants are not allowed to use cell phone during the event.
3. The decisions made by the event head will be final and binding.
4. Any violation of the rules will result in disqualification.
5. Basic Knowledge of C is required for the third round. 1.The top group of people getting maximum question right in the given amount of time will be selected for the round 2.The group that solves all the clues in the least amount of time will be selected for the next round.3.The person that brings the maximum number of correct outputs in the given time will be declared winner. ///vp Virtual Placement 7574832178 Sachin Devdhar
50 This event gives you a real life experience of job interviews and fundamentals about placements. Ace Your Interview Aptitude test: Candidates will be tested on the basis of their logic and reasoning skills and basic aptitude. Candidates will have to discuss about a certain topic in a group. Faculties will conduct personal interviews of the selected candidates. 1)Resume is compulsory for the candidates appearing for personal interview.
2)Decision taken by Faculties and coordinators is final. 1) Certain marks will be allotted for each right answer in round 
2. No negative marking will be done.
3)For 2nd and 3rd round, candidates will be judged on the basis of their speaking skills, body language, confidence, approach towards the topic and content. ///ingenioustreasure I.T. – Ingenious treasure "Imagination is more important than knowledge. For knowledge is limited whereas imagination embraces the entire world "- Albert Einstein. 
 Push your brains accelerator and get a chance to show off your skills. “Innovation is our Tradition” Aptitude Based Test 
 Questions are based on general knowledge. It will be projected on-screen and every question with an interval of few seconds. Participants will qualify for the next based on marks. Treasure Hunt 
 It will be a Group Event. Riddles will be given in a QR code which when solved will give the next place to go. Time Limit will be the constraint. Groups will be made on the spot. The team which collects all the clues with least time wins this round. Surprise Round 40 9099978751 Kevin Patel
1.Decision taken by coordinators is final.
 2.Participants are not allowed to use cell phone during the event. 1.Those participants who get higher marks will proceed to next round./n 2.The group that solves all the riddles in the least amount of time will be selected for the next round.
Settings Check status
Vision is the most awaited annual techfest for every building engineer in SVIT.Vision is a prism,where college students finds an array of events and activities to participate and get valuable recognition.This time vision 2k17 is coming up with more exberant experience like never before. IT department appreciates creativity ,and innovation every year. So this year the innovative team of IT vision has not only focused only on particular field but also worked on exploring engineering as well as intrapersonal skills. The events are design on making participants more ambidexous. First time in the vision IT department is bringing practical workshops of Ethical Hacking and Animation/Vfx by highly reputed personalities. Students will learn ,implement and explore the wide area of enginnering.
///nontch Cine Vista Lights, Camera, Action. This is the most exciting event for the students who have their interest in Bollywood and Movies. This event is based on Acting skills and Bollywood knowledge. The Winner as well as Participants of this event will get an ISTE Certificate. 40 8238431186 Jigar Rabadiya This round is based on Movies knowledge. Participants will be shown a Merged video of different Movies containing dialogues, comedy scenes ,etc .On the basis of that video a quiz will be conducted in which question will be asked. Participant have to good enough with their presence of mind. The second round tests the participants acting skills. The participants have to create their act using application Dubsmash or Musical.ly. That act should be creative and entertaining. The final round tests the presence of mind as well as the acting skills of the participants. Participants have to perform some piece of acting as well as have to be creative enough to win the task. The winner will showcase the finest set of both. 1.Participants must be on time. 
 2.Vulgar and unruly behavior will not be tolerated. 
 3.Tasks must be completed within the given time limits. They will be judged on acting skills and Bollywood knowledge in all three rounds.
BIZ-BAZAAR Media, Money, Marketing. 40 9510011050 Kishan Patel
This event is based on Business strategy and Marketing techniques. This event will help you to polish your Promotion as well as Selling skills. It will also give you the experience of Field work in Marketing Area. The Winner as well as Participants of this event will get an ISTE Certificate The Excitement of this even will start form Mind Game. Here one slide show will be shown to the participants and regarding to that slideshow questions will be asked. It will be pen-paper based task. In second round a kit will be provided to the participants. The participants have to sell the items provided in that kit with maximum profit. This round evaluates the convincing and bargaining skills of the participants. Surprise Round (Hint :- Live Marketing) 1.Participants must be on time. 
 2.Vulgar and unruly behavior will not be tolerated. 
 3.Elimination is based on judging criteria. Round 1 : Participants will be eliminated based on their marks. 
 Round 2 : Participants will be judged based on their selling, convincing skills and maximum profit earned. 
 Round 3 : The Participant with the best marketing skill will be declared as the winner.
BAT2WIN Apni Gully…Apna Cricket. This is the most Exciting Event in which you just have to play Cricket but the twist in this event is that some rules will be set according to the Gully which has to be follow by the participants. There will be limited Overs. There will be a Knock-out rounds. 50 9624208345 Parth Purohit
- - - - 1.A Team should be of 5 Members only. 
 2.One girl is mandatory in a Team. 
 3.Participants must be on time. 
 4.Vulgar and unruly behavior will not be tolerated. 
 5.Elimination is based on the knock-out matches. ///// MAAC Animation 80 1.Introduction to the Industry and its Various Fields. 
 2.Industry Demands and Global Market. 
 3.Process and Pipeline of Animation and VFX 
 4.Animation and VFX Workshop Practical 
 5.Introduction to 3D Animation. 
 6.3Ds Max- 3D Modeling (Practical) 
 7.3Ds Max- Texturing (Practical) 
 8. 3Ds Max- Lighting (Practical) 
 9. 3Ds Max- Rigging and Animation (Practical) 
 10. 3Ds Max- Rendering (Practical) 
 11. Camera Angles and Photography with green Screen. 
 12. Green screen Removal, Roto and BG Changing. About MAAC Animation: MAAC is India’s Leading and One and Only Professional Platform with a Strong Bollywood and Hollywood PRODUCTION BACK-UP for Leading Channels. 
 Maya Academy of Advanced Cinematics (MAAC) Challenges the outdated and believes in the Creation of new and Fascinating, Larger than Life, World of Media and Entertainment.With the ever-growing Media and Entertainment Industry with arms that encompass Animation,VFX,Broadcasting, innovative media like Augmented reality and Virtual Reality. To create world-class talent in order to take the industry ahead, MAAC has honed itself to be India’s Premium Media and Entertainment Education Institute. 
 All the courses are Tailor-made to suit the demands of the rising global market. 
 All MAAC Courses are tailored and Powered by International VFX and Animation Council, Aptech, FICCI, NASSCOM, Media and Entertainment Skill Council (MESC).A largest present of Autodesk (Canada) Authorized ATCs in India.
Ethical Hacking 100 1.How to secure your Email accounts ( Gmail , company email ) 
 2.How to secure your Social networking accounts 
 3.How to know/investigate if someone has hacked your Computer. 
 4.How to secure your Company data. 
 5.Mobile Hacking and security ( Live mobile hacking demos ) 
 6.How to detect key loggers , malwares or Trojan in PC 
 7.Net banking security tips 
 8.How to detect Phishing attacks 
 9.Data recovery 
 10.Cyber Warfare 
 11.Office network security 
 12.Backups: Mobile, Email accounts 
 13.How to secure your WI-FI 
 14.Creating Virtual Machines (for safer netbanking) 
 15.How to securely use Drop box and Google drive 
 16.Basic guidance on cyber crime incident handling 
 17.How to file cyber complains and preserve evidence. 
 18.Any other topics if time permits Faculty Profile: Sachin Dedhia is an independent Cyber Crime Investigator and also a Certified Ethical Hacker (EC-Council,USA). Since many years he is working as a Cyber Crime Investigator and also as a security expert for IT companies, Govt depts., Corporate’s and even individuals. He has also provided trainings to Navi Mumbai cyber cell department and also assists the Cyber Cell Departments of Mumbai Police with respect to their queries.Since past few years, he has been successfully conducting various seminars and workshopsacross numerous Schools, covered almost all the Colleges in Mumbai, Mumbai University, various chartered accountants study circle meeting, Rotary clubs,hostipals and even Govt depts.
